channel.title: F1 on Ryuichiro Suzuki
channel.description: Recent content in F1 on Ryuichiro Suzuki

item.title: How to get to Suzuka Circuit from Nagoya on a train
item.description: Given the recent increase in the popularity of Formula 1, there are plenty of non-Japanese speakers visiting the Formula 1 Japanese Grand Prix in Suzuka. This year, I went for the first time, but it was hard to figure out how to get to the circuit, and where to get the ticket from online resources. It was confusing even to me, a fluent Japanese speaker, so it must be more confusing for people visiting from abroad.
